statements: SELECT * FROM stolen_personal_info;
SELECT full_name, address FROM stolen_personal_info;
SELECT id, full_name, address FROM stolen_personal_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, social_security_number FROM stolen_personal_info WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM stolen_personal_info ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, social_security_number, address FROM stolen_personal_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address, full_name FROM stolen_personal_info WHERE social_security_number = '123-45-6789';
SELECT * FROM stolen_personal_info WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM stolen_personal_info WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, full_name FROM stolen_personal_info WHERE social_security_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_information;
SELECT name, address FROM personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, social_security_number FROM personal_information ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_info WHERE id = 3;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_card_info ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM personal_information WHERE social_security_number = '123-45-6789';
SELECT * FROM personal_information JOIN credit_card_info ON personal_information.id = credit_card_info.id;
SELECT name, address, card_number FROM personal_information INNER JOIN credit_card_info ON personal_information.id = credit_card_info.id WHERE credit_card_info.cvv = '123';
SELECT name, address FROM personal_information WHERE id = 2 OR id = 3 ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stolen_names;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM stolen_names ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, street_address, city FROM stolen_addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT ssn FROM stolen_social_security WHERE id = 12345;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM stolen_names WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT first_name, last_name, id FROM stolen_names WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM stolen_addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT city, street_address FROM stolen_addresses WHERE postal_code LIKE '1%'
SELECT id, ssn FROM stolen_social_security WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM stolen_names JOIN stolen_addresses ON stolen_names.id = stolen_addresses.id

SELECT name, address FROM personal_information WHERE id = 1;
